name: Chicken Ginger
recipeIngredient: 2 skinless chicken breasts - sliced into bite sized pieces,
Small bunch of Thai celery (or European celery leaves) - chopped,
recipeInstructions: On a low heat, add the ginger and garlic and fry to 30 seconds. It should become fragrant.
Add the chicken. Increase to a medium heat. Fry for 2 minutes until slightly undercooked. The chicken should be white on the outside, but still slightly pink in the center.
Add the remaining vegetables except the Thai celery , and fry for 1 minute.
Add the oyster sauce, soy sauce, fish sauce, and sugar and cook for a further minute.
Add the Thai celery, mix, and serve.
